title: E-Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Workplace and Professional Learner Empowerment via Practice Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze workplace problems using a practice theory framework and propose at least three improvement measures.
Learners can enhance the efficiency of language-based work processes (e.g., report writing, meeting facilitation) by over 20% through collaborative practices with peers.
Learners can perform practical assignments via a mobile-accessible LMS and revise action strategies weekly by incorporating feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
